thread.title_full: Service Lloyds Selects Tropics Software to Modernize and Grow its Workers’ Compensation Business

author: Jennifer Raymer
title: Service Lloyds Selects Tropics Software to Modernize and Grow its Workers’ Compensation Business
text:
Tropics Software Technologies (Tropics), a national software company specializing in workers’ compensation software systems, today announced that Service Lloyds Insurance Company (Service Lloyds) has selected Tropics Breeze software to modernize and expand its workers’ compensation insurance business. Tropics will install the full suite of Tropics Breeze products consisting of Underwriting, Rating, Billing, Policy Administration, Claims Administration, Self-Service Portals, and Business Intelligence. “After an extensive search, we are excited to bring Tropics into our operation as our core data management source,” said Martin Jenns, President, Service Lloyds. “Our agents and policyholders are accustomed to our culture of providing high levels of service while building long term relationships. With the implementation of this new system, we will bring that same level of service to data management allowing our clients to retrieve information and analyze all aspects of their business. Through the Tropics partnership, Service Lloyds will be well positioned to continue with its growth and expansion objectives while continuing to deliver exceptional levels of service across the entire value chain of the business.”
“I am very excited about being a partner with Service Lloyds as they expand in the workers’ compensation market,” said Mike Mobar, President and CEO of Tropics Software Technologies. He added that, “The new generation of our workers’ compensation software, Tropics Breeze, is culmination of 20 years of Tropics Software experience in workers’ comp automation and application of the latest web technologies. We look forward to making this a successful venture for both companies as we add them to our ever increasing list of successful carrier implementations completed over the last two decades.”
About Tropics Software Technologies:
Tropics Software Technologies is a national software company specializing in workers’ compensation systems. They provide integrated, web-enabled policy, claims and billing systems. Tropics offers a comprehensive set of configurable modules, based on a common foundation of automated work and document management, which boosts business efficiency.
For additional information, please contact Jennifer Raymer at (888) 925-1234 Ext 4338, by email at jennifer.raymer@gotropics.com, or visit our website at http://www.gotropics.com .
About Service Lloyds:
SLIC is ranked as one of the top ten providers of workers’ compensation and nonsubscription in the State of Texas and has been serving the needs of employers since 1982. The company is family-owned and operated dedicated exclusively to the needs of Texas businesses. Service Lloyds has built its reputation on providing a quality product while delivering unmatched support and personal service. Current writings are in excess of $65,000,000 with an A- VIII A.M. Best Rating. For more information, please visit http://www.servicelloyds.com .
